cause.description:
We use an old red canoe (dubbed the "Red Member") or a rented infaitable raft to drift down the bow river. Rum is a must though other fine beverages will be considered. Wearing pirate hats is encouraged.
1. Sail the Bow river
2. Drink Rum
3. Act like a pirate
4. sing pirate songs and say "YAARGGHH" a lot
5. Drink Rum
cause.mission: Float down the Bow river and act like pirates
cause.name: Pirates of the Bow
